descriptions.energyAnalyst: Analyze energy consumption data, monitor device energy usage, mark anomalies and assist optimization
descriptions.envSpecialist: Monitor cold storage temperature, humidity, and lighting, abnormal alarms and optimize lighting usage
descriptions.healthManager: Identify major anomalies based on AC energy consumption, warn of equipment failures
descriptions.coordinator: Integrate multi-source data, provide basic operational status monitoring dashboard
